General.Name: Tsang Yow Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Tsang Yow Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies transmission system components and assemblies worldwide. It provides automatic and manual transmission, off highway machinery, torque converter, and viscous coupling parts; clutch parts for heavy-duty trucks; and gear boxes. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 18, Chung Shan Rd., Chiayi, Taiwan, 62154
